traits.name: Plus Strength
traits.description: Increases Strength by 100.

traits.name: Plus Defense
traits.description: Increases Defense by 100.

traits.name: Natural Selection
traits.description: Always attacks foe with least HP.

traits.name: Huge Strength
traits.description: Attacks pass through the first row

traits.name: Gains
traits.description: Increase attack and defense by 1.

traits.name: Fencing drill
traits.description: Block one attack and strike back with a counter

traits.name: Martyr
traits.description: If a friendly neighbour is in trouble, this unit jumps in to save them.

traits.name: Lightning strike
traits.description: Call down lightning bolts upon your enemy.

traits.name: Blast
traits.description: Strike at your enemy and its neighbours.

traits.name: Strike
traits.description: Strike the enemy with your weapon.

traits.name: DummyTrait
traits.description: Dummytext for a dummytrait. Lets just add some more words to it.

traits.name: Giant strength
traits.description: Attacks pass through the first row

traits.name: Shield bearer
traits.description: Gets +2 Weapon proficiency when defending from an attack.

traits.name: IncreaseWepProfBoon
traits.description: Increase WP by given amount.

traits.name: Warrior guild
traits.description: The warriors guild. Gives +5 WP and Strike for attack, as well as a counter attack.

traits.name: Hero guild
traits.description: The heroes guild. Gives +3 WP and Strike for attack.

traits.name: Witch guild
traits.description: The witches guild. Gives +1 WP and Lightning strike for attack.

traits.name: Full body armor
traits.description: All damage taken is reduced by 2. Gives -1 WP.

traits.name: Rage
traits.description: Perform an attack on a random target upon taking damage.

traits.name: Attached
traits.description: Gets +3 attack when a friend dies.

traits.name: Formation
traits.description: Gets +2 WP for each neighbour with Formation.

traits.name: InspiringHeroism
traits.description: Any dying ally performs one last attack before they die.
